channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.2 Extended Update Support
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.2 Extended Update Support

item.title: CVE-2023-5090|2024-06-12T09:31:47.782Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20enterprise%20linux%209.2%20extended%20update%20support
item.description: A flaw was found in KVM. An improper check in svm_set_x2apic_msr_interception() may allow direct access to host x2apic msrs when the guest resets its apic, potentially leading to a denial of service condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-2905|2024-06-04T17:29:28.680Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20enterprise%20linux%209.2%20extended%20update%20support
item.description: A security vulnerability has been discovered within rpm-ostree, pertaining to the /etc/shadow file in default builds having the world-readable bit enabled. This issue arises from the default permissions being set at a higher level than recommended, potentially exposing sensitive authentication data to unauthorized access.
